column2: Silver Spike Acquisition Corp is a blank check company. The Company is formed for the purpose of effecting a merger, amalgamation, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to focus on the cannabis and related health and wellness industries. It also intends to focus on non-plant touching businesses that support the functioning of cannabis activity but are not directly related to cultivation, manufacturing, processing, branding, transportation, distribution, storage or sale of cannabis and cannabis-based products. The Company has not conducted any operations and has generated no revenues.
